00114 /**
00115  * @brief Run the analysis.
00116  */
00117 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodCNLossLOHConcordance::run()
00118 {
00119     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodCNLossLOHConcordance::run(...) start");
00120     CNCychp& cychpIndex = getCychpIndex();
00121     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00122     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00123 
00124     getIndexSegments().deleteAll();
00125     getMotherSegments().deleteAll();
00126     getFatherSegments().deleteAll();
00127 
00128     int iProbeSetCount = cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount();
00129     if (cychpMother.getFamilialCall() == 1)
00130     {
00131         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodCNLossLOHConcordance::run(...) Mother's segments ", iProbeSetCount, 100000, (iProbeSetCount / 100000));
00132         for (int i = 0; (i < iProbeSetCount); i++)
00133         {
00134             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00135             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pIndex = cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(i);
00136             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMother = cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(i);
00137             pMother->setSegmentInput(1);
00138             if ((pMother->getGenotypeCall() == -1) || (pIndex->getGenotypeCall() == -1))
00139             {
00140                 pMother->setSegmentInput(-1);
00141             }
00142             else
00143             {
00144                 pMother->setSegmentInput(1);
00145                 if (pIndex->getLohCall() == 1)
00146                 {
00147                     if (pIndex->getCNLoss(cychpIndex.getCychpHeader().getGender(), m_iXChromosome, m_iYChromosome) == 1)
00148                     {
00149                         if (isGenotypeConcordance(pIndex, pMother)) {pMother->setSegmentInput(0);}
00150                     }
00151                 }
00152             }
00153         }
00154         anneal(cychpMother);
00155         newSegments(cychpIndex, cychpMother, 1, getMotherSegments(), getSegmentType(), 1, m_iMarkerCountCutoff, m_iCallCutoff, m_iMinGenomicSpan);
00156         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00157     }
00158     if (cychpFather.getFamilialCall() == 1)
00159     {
00160         Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodCNLossLOHConcordance::run(...) Father's segments ", iProbeSetCount, 100000, (iProbeSetCount / 100000));
00161         for (int i = 0; (i < iProbeSetCount); i++)
00162         {
00163             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00164             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pIndex = cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(i);
00165             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pFather = cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(i);
00166             if ((pFather->getGenotypeCall() == -1) || (pIndex->getGenotypeCall() == -1))
00167             {
00168                 pFather->setSegmentInput(-1);
00169             }
00170             else
00171             {
00172                 pFather->setSegmentInput(1);
00173                 if (pIndex->getLohCall() == 1)
00174                 {
00175                     if (pIndex->getCNLoss(cychpIndex.getCychpHeader().getGender(), m_iXChromosome, m_iYChromosome) == 1)
00176                     {
00177                         if (isGenotypeConcordance(pIndex, pFather)) {pFather->setSegmentInput(0);}
00178                     }
00179                 }
00180             }
00181         }
00182         anneal(cychpFather);
00183         newSegments(cychpIndex, cychpFather, 2, getFatherSegments(), getSegmentType(), 1, m_iMarkerCountCutoff, m_iCallCutoff, m_iMinGenomicSpan);
00184         Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00185     }
00186 
00187     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodCNLossLOHConcordance::run(...) end");
00188 }
